Reviews.Title: Second Casio "lemon" purchased
Reviews.Author: tkbailey
Reviews.Content: Hi,I purchased a pink Casio EXilim EX-Z550 while in New York City.  It lasted the week that I needed it to, but after returning home, tried to use the camera and it said Lens Error.  It turns on, then makes a clicking noise and immediately turns off.I purchased a second pink Casio EXilim-EX-S5from Amazon the next month, believing that I broke the original camera,as my last digital camera was purchased (prior to these fancy tiny pink things)in 2000!  The new Casio survived for 6 months before the same lens error popped up.  I read somewhere that the lens retraction mechanism is very delicate and dust can prevent the lens from retracting.  I was quoted $85 to fix this.  Not worth the money the first time, let alone the second time!  Very frustrating, especially since I bought 2 memory cards for these cameras.

Reviews.Title: Grainy pictures, flimsy - do not recommend
Reviews.Author: Chinook
Reviews.Content: After searching for the cameras for hours on end, I decided to purchase the Casio EX-ZS5. I thought that you couldn't go wrong with a 14.1 mp camera, but boy was I wrong! This camera is super flimsy, picture quality is pretty bad (very grainy), and feels like it could break any second. Not to mention the zoom is absolutely useless! Don't get me wrong - this is not a terrible camera, but there are better ones out there for the same price (if not cheaper). I highly recommend the Kodak Easyshare C195. It takes crystal clear photos, is very sturdy, and is very cheap (I got mine for $79). You cannot go wrong with that camera.Do yourself a favor and avoid buying the Casio EX-ZS5!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: ellkay
Reviews.Content: I had this camera for 2 years before it broke (it was totally my fault, not faulty) and it's always worked like a charm. For the price, it's pretty unbeatable. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pink Camera
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Got it for my girlfriend use it a few time it is pretty good. The camera does not feel cheap, came with has a small rechargeable battery. This item is good for it price.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for the money
Reviews.Author: T. Walton "Allright Appraiser"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera that didn't break the bank.  I use the camera appraising real estate and on average I take 50 pictures a day.  I bought this camera because I had gotten such great service out of a previous Casio Exilm (5mp) camera.  With my wife working in the business I needed another.  I've used the camera for several weeks now and am not disappointed.  The slightly wider view angle works great for my needs; the downside to that is that I think this impacts the magnification of the 5x zoom - doesn't seem much more magnification than the 3x zoom on the old camera.  Regardless it works perfectly for me.PS- some of the reviews indicated that the camera was delicate.  That has not been my experience.  I've dropped it several times and it has kept on ticking.  In my experience over the years using many cameras similar to this, drop any camera on the lense while it is extended will ruin it if it lands on the lense.  Otherwise these little cameras are reasonably rugged.

Reviews.Title: Camera for my Mom.
Reviews.Author: Jessie Jones
Reviews.Content: She loves it. She loves taking pictures of her garden and flowers with this camera. Plus she loves the color. Very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: KH
Reviews.Content: this camera takes very nice pictures, and has a very easy to use menu. works well with my mac and pc alike. this is a value for the high mega pixel resolution.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last more than a month
Reviews.Author: heathbc888
Reviews.Content: Our daughter got this for Christmas. Unfortunately, it stopped working after only a few weeks. On Amazon now shopping for another brand.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: s gomez
Reviews.Content: No body wanted pink.  It was a good price and it still working.  I bought this about two Christmases ago.

Reviews.Title: It was ok I was expecting the casio exilim to be more slim.
Reviews.Author: Simi
Reviews.Content: It was ok I was expecting the casio exilim to be more slim. I guess I will keep the camera since I ordered already.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1 Megapixels
5x Optical zoom with 26mm wide angle lens
2.7 inch 230K LCD monitor

ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-ZS5 Pink 14 MP Stylish and Slim Digital Camera with 5x Wide-Angle Zoom
